items.text: length, spins in, turned away to midwicket

items.text: presses forward and pushes to point
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: blocked off the front foot with bat close to pad
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: defended off the outside of the bat to point
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: loops up a fuller one around fourth stump and gets it to straighten to draw the outside edge, drops short of first slip
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: floats up a full toss, driven to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: spins in sharply to rap the pad, heading down leg with that much turn
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: again, slides in and spins to rap the pad. Going down leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: pushed off the front foot
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: attempts an expansive punch, beaten
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full and spinning in, defended
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: defends a length ball from the crease
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: short, a bit of width, waits and cuts through point
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

items.text: floated up outside off, driven wide of long-off
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mosaddek Hossain, 2 runs

items.text: spins in, punched off the backfoot to mid-on
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: comes on straight with the arm. Shahzad claims a catch as the batsman looks to open the face. Daylight
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: dabbed to midwicket
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: pitches outside leg and spins away further down to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, 2 wides

items.text: pitched up on middle and leg, Mashrafe slogs it way up in the air and Aftab Alam at deep midwicket moves to his left and settles under a skier. Terrific catch. Eleven-ball duck for the Bangladesh captain
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza c Aftab Alam b Mohammad Nabi 0 (11b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, no run

items.text: pushed back to the bowler who parries it to mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Abu Hider, 1 run

items.text: was there an edge? Looks to open the face, and yup, off the edge, into the right pad of Shahzad before it deflects away. Tough one
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run
